text: Piano, Bass and Drums is a music DVD that features the musical collaboration of R&B; singer Patrice Rushen, and other musicians such as Darek Oleszkiewicz, Ndugu Chancler as well as many others. ==Track listings== # Mr. P.C. # Red Clay # Ocean Song # Like A Dream # Arrival # Shortie's Portion # Simple Essence # Night In Tunisia # Variance # I Mean You ==References== * Category:Patrice Rushen video albums Category:2007 video albums Category:Live video albums Category:Collaborative albums Category:2007 live albums
title: Piano, Bass and Drums
